reliquary:BattleHymnPlus.NAME: Battle Anthem
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b
reliquary:BattleHymnPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Battle Hymn power.

reliquary:ChainReaction.NAME: Chain Reaction
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
reliquary:ChainReaction.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: Combust is an existing power in the base game.

reliquary:FocusDown.NAME: Focus Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, lose #b

reliquary:HandSize.NAME: Hand Size Up
DESCRIPTIONS: Your maximum hand size is increased by #b
Your maximum hand size is decreased by #b

NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an alternate version of the Watcher's Blasphemy debuff.
Instead of killing you at the end of the current turn (1 turn), it kills you in N turns.
It takes the name ('Blasphemer,' in English) from the existing debuff, so you don't need to translate that.

reliquary:InvincibleTurns.NAME: Invincible
DESCRIPTIONS: Can't be harmed for the next #b

reliquary:LesserDuplication.NAME: Lesser Duplication
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next cost 0 or 1 card is played twice this turn.
cost 0 or 1 cards are played twice this turn.
reliquary:LesserDuplication.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an weaker version of the base game's Duplication power.

reliquary:ReduceColorlessCost.NAME: Pallor
DESCRIPTIONS: The next Colorless card you play costs #b1 less.
Colorless cards you play cost #b1 less.

reliquary:StudyPlus.NAME: Cram
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, shuffle #b
reliquary:StudyPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Study power.

reliquary:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
DESCRIPTIONS: Other enemies can't be targeted until this enemy dies.

reliquary:Vim.NAME: Envimmed
NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: 'Envimmed' isn't a real word, it's an adjective I made up to mean 'infused with vim,' as 'invigorated' means 'infused with vigor.'
Feel free to use anything that means invigorated, or make one up...?
This uses the description strings from the Berserk power.
